api_list.name: Translate any language to Spanish
api_list.description: AI powered API that translates any language to Spanish
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-any-language-to-spanish.p.rapidapi.com/api/spanish/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-any-language-to-spanish.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://translate-any-language-to-spanish.p.rapidapi.com/api/spanish/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
